title: Autistic kid gets bullied/assaulted by grill, feminazi "Autistic kid isnt the victim."
body:
http://rare.us/story/what-these-girls-did-to-a-boy-with-autism-is-sick-and-so-is-this-feminists-response/
At first I thought all feminists were the same "honest human beings who fight for something right", but then I learned the difference between real feminist who actually fight for the right of women and feminazi who just vomit pure stupidity out of their mouth .feminazi are nothing but women who like other women and are jealous of males for having a tool that they dont have .
